posts.post_title: WTB: Cobb Bat On Shoulder SGC/PSA 4 (50)- 6 (80)
posts.post_content:
Looking for an SGC or PSA 4-6. Any back is fine.
Please let me know if you're considering selling or have a lead.

Would prefer an SGC example but would also consider a PSA copy.

Thanks!

posts.post_title: WTB: Cobb Bat On Shoulder SGC/PSA 4 (50)- 6 (80)
posts.post_content:
BiMonthly Bump for Cobb Bat On Shoulder

I was fortunate to pick up a great Red Background Cobb from a fellow forum member this week which brings the total to 3 of 3 poses currently n my set having been acquired through the help of the great Net 54 community. Thanks to everyone who has helped me get this far!
